name: Investments
text: §432D-7  Investments.  All investments permitted under section 432D-3(a)(1) may be considered admitted assets in determination of net worth; provided that these investments are in compliance with article 6 of chapter 431. [L 1995, c 179, pt of §1; am L 2000, c 74, §5; am L 2003, c 212, §126]
